簝字的基本解释

簝
liáo
古代宗庙祭祀盛肉的竹器。
竹名。

簝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liáo］
［《廣韻》落蕭切，平蕭，來。］
［《廣韻》魯刀切，平豪，來。］
(1)古代宗庙盛肉的竹器。
(2)竹名。

簝字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　簝； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页898第52
【廣韻】落蕭切【集韻】【韻會】憐蕭切【正韻】連條切，?音聊。宗廟盛肉竹器。【周禮·地官】凡祭祀，共其牛牲之互，與其盆簝以待事。【註】盆以盛血，簝以受肉。　又【廣韻】魯刀切【集韻】【韻會】郞刀切，?音勞。義同。　又魯皓切，音老。義同。

簝字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

簝字的起名意思

暂无。

簝
Basic explanation of words
簝
liáo
The ancient ancestral temple worships bamboo wares for holding meat.
Bamboo name.
簝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liáo］
["Guangyun" falls off Xiaoqie, Pingxiao, come. ]
["Guangyun" Lu knife cut, Pinghao, come. ]
(1) The bamboo utensils used to hold meat in ancient ancestral temples.
(2) Bamboo name.
簝
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　簝; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 898 52
[Guang Yun] Luo Xiaoqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Pity Xiaoqie [Zheng Yun] Cut one after another, and talk to each other. Bamboo ware for meat in the ancestral temple. [Zhou Li·Diguan] Everyone who sacrifices to sacrifices to each other's cattle and animals, and their pots to wait for things. [Note] The basin is used to hold blood, and the scorpion is used to receive meat.　 [Guang Yun] Lu knife cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Tan knife cut,? Yin Lao. The same meaning.　 Lu Hao cut again, the sound is old. The same meaning.
